item.title: ID-33 East at ID-22 East
item.description: ID-33 east at ID-22 east to Dubois and Salmon (via ID-28). Continue east on ID-33 for Rexburg.

item.title: ID-33 East Approaching ID-22
item.description: ID-33 east approaching ID-22. Turn left for ID-22 east.

item.title: I-15 South Offramp at ID-22
item.description: I-15 south (Exit 167) offramp at ID-22. Turn right for ID-22 west to Craters of the Moon National Monument and Arco. Turn left for Dubois.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 167
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 167 - ID-22 West/Dubois.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 167
item.description: I-15 South approaching Exit 167 - ID-22/Dubois/Arco. The actual sign at the exit omits Arco from the destination.

item.title: ID-33 East at ID-22 East
item.description: ID-33 east at ID-22 east to Dubois and Salmon. Continue east on ID-33 for Rexburg.

item.title: ID-33 East Approaching ID-22
item.description: ID-33 east approaching ID-22. Turn left for ID-22 east.

item.title: ID-22 West at ID-28
item.description: ID-22 west at ID-28. ID-28 has a brown shield because it is part of the Sacajawea Historic Byway.

item.title: ID-22 West at ID-28
item.description: ID-22 west at ID-28 north to Salmon and south to Idaho Falls.

item.title: ID-22 West Approaching ID-28
item.description: ID-22 west approaching ID-28.

item.title: ID-22 West Approaching ID-28
item.description: ID-22 west approaching ID-28

item.title: ID-22 West - Idaho National Laboratory
item.description: Entering the Idaho National Laboratory on ID-22 west.

item.title: ID-22 West at Clark County A1
item.description: ID-22 west at Clark County A1 south to Monteview.

item.title: ID-22 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-22 west to Howe, Arco, and Boise.

item.title: ID-22 West
item.description: ID-22 just west of Dubois.

item.title: ID-22 West at I-15 South Onramp
item.description: ID-22 west at I-15 south Exit 167 onramp to Hamer and Idaho Falls. Continue west on ID-22 for Arco.

item.title: Begin ID-22 West at I-15
item.description: Begin ID-22 west at I-15 north to Butte. ID-22 continues west towards Arco. Use I-15 south for Idaho Falls.

item.title: End ID-22 East at I-15
item.description: End ID-22 at I-15 north to Butte.

item.title: I-15 Exit 167 Offramp at ID-22
item.description: I-15 south at ID-22. Use ID-22 west for Arco, and Craters of the Moon National Monument.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 167
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 167 - ID-22 West/CR-A2/Dubois.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 167
item.description: I-15 South approaching Exit 167 - ID-22/Clark County A2/Dubois/Arco. The actual sign at the exit omits Arco from the destination.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 167
item.description: I-15 north Exit 167 - ID-22 West/Clark County A2/Dubois.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 167
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 167 - ID-22 West/Clark County A2/Dubois.

item.title: End ID-22 at ID-33
item.description: ID-33 to Rexburg and Arco at End ID-22. Big Southern Butte in background.

item.title: End ID-22 at ID-33
item.description: End ID-22 at ID-33

item.title: End ID-22 West at ID-33
item.description: Jct. ID-33 on ID-22 West

item.description: ID-28 South at ID-22

item.description: ID-22 Shield on ID-22 North

item.title: ID-22 North Approaching I-15
item.description: ID-22 East Approaching I-15 Junction

item.title: ID-22 North at I-15
item.description: Freeway Entrance for I-15 at Eastern Terminus of ID-22 North

item.title: ID-22 North at ID-28
item.description: ID-22/ID-28 Junction on ID-22 East

item.title: ID-22 North at ID-28
item.description: ID-22/ID-28 Junction to Dubois/Salmon/Rexburg on ID-22 East

item.title: I-15 North Exit 167
item.description: I-15 North Exit 167 - ID-22/CR-A2/Dubois. Dubois is the county seat of Clark County, Idaho the smallest (population wise) county in the state.
